strings.0x0A: Missing signal: coolant temperature sensor, main
strings.0x0B: Missing signal: coolant temperature sensor, radiator outlet
strings.0x0C: Implausible signal: coolant temperature value above maximum plausible value
strings.0x12: Missing signal: camshaft position sensor, exhaust
strings.0x19: Activate upstream lambda probe heater, bank 1
strings.0x27: Brake light switch / test switch, implausible
strings.0x28: Brake light switch signal / pedal position sensor, implausible
strings.0x2B: Multi-function steering wheel, seesaw key implausible
strings.0x32: Activate Solenoid Valve fuel circulation switch
strings.0x37: Activate upstream lambda probe heater, bank 2
strings.0x38: Missing signal: ignition current measuring resistor
strings.0x3D: Activate downstream lambda probe heater, bank 2
strings.0x4F: Activate downstream lambda probe heater, bank 1
strings.0x73: Reference voltage: voltage controller 1 FW-sensor / DK-sensor 1
strings.0x74: Reference voltage: voltage controller 2 FW-sensor / DK-sensor 2
strings.0x76: Plausibility Signal motor throttle valve-sensor potentiometer 1 and 2
strings.0x77: Motor throttle valve MDK mecanical error (jammed or difficult to move)
strings.0x78: Throttle pedal or body: Implausibile position
strings.0x7E: Activate Solenoid Valve tank leak diagnostic pump
strings.0x7F: Activate Solenoid Valve sucking jet pump
strings.0x8C: Tank leak diagnostic pump: reed switch not closed
strings.0x8D: Tank leak diagnostic pump: reed switch open not more
strings.0x8E: Tank leak diagnostic pump: reed switch closed not more
strings.0x8F: Tank ventilation stuffed pipe Tank - AKF
strings.0x95: Plausibility error air mass compared to pedal position
strings.0x96: Upstream oxygen sensor: value above upper limit, bank 1
strings.0x97: Upstream oxygen sensor: value less then lower limit, bank 1
strings.0x98: Upstream oxygen sensor: missing signal, bank 1
strings.0x99: Upstream oxygen sensor: value above upper limit, bank 2
strings.0x9A: Upstream oxygen sensor: value less then lower limit, bank 2
strings.0x9B: Upstream oxygen sensor: missing signal, bank 2
strings.0x9C: Downstream oxygen sensor: value above upper limit, bank 1
strings.0x9D: Downstream oxygen sensor: value less then lower limit, bank 1
strings.0x9F: Downstream oxygen sensor: value above upper limit, bank 2
strings.0xA0: Downstream oxygen sensor: value less then lower limit, bank 2
strings.0xA9: MDK output stage control after diagnostic failure
strings.0xAC: Signal PWG-poti potentiometer 1 and 2 short circuit
strings.0xAD: Signal throttle flap poti potentiometer 1 and 2 short circuit
strings.0xBC: Heating performance upstream lambda probe, bank 1
strings.0xBD: Heating performance upstream lambda probe, bank 2
strings.0xBE: Heating performance downstream lambda probe, bank 1
strings.0xBF: Heating performance downstream lambda probe, bank 2
strings.0xD2: Error ignition current measuring on more as 2 cylinder
strings.0xD7: Downstream oxygen sensor: missing signal, bank 1
strings.0xD8: Downstream oxygen sensor: missing signal, bank 2
strings.0xDC: LS voltage NKAT sensor 1, sensor too slow
strings.0xDD: LS voltage NKAT sensor 2, sensor too slow
strings.0xE3: Lambda contol tolerance too big, bank 1
strings.0xE4: Lambda contol tolerance too big, bank 2
strings.0xE5: Control frequency lambda probe faulty, bank 1
strings.0xE6: Control frequency lambda probe faulty, bank 2
strings.0xF5: Secondary air system: air flow too low, bank 1
strings.0xF6: Secondary air system: air flow too low, bank 2
strings.0xF7: Secondary air valve open, blocked mechanically
